Text: BNP Paribas Arbitrage SA raised its stake in shares of Customers Bancorp by 75,462.5% during the first quarter. BNP Paribas Arbitrage SA now owns 6,045 shares of the bank's stock valued at $111,000 after acquiring an additional 6,037 shares during the last quarter.
